title: kallO unadu nenjam
sahitya:
kallO unadu nenjam ayyA ennaik-kaDaikkaN pArAyO konjam


anupallavi

  allum paghalum �namah shivAya� abhayam enrE 
sholli sholli kenjum shuddhan mEl EnO vanjam


caraNam    appanE enraDi paTrum aDiyArkkun anbai maraippadAmO
tappidam pala kOTi sheida maghanaiyum tandai verukkap-pOmO
ipparu uDalilE ennuyirkk-uyirAgi idaya guhaiyil iruppAi
arivanE nAn vaikkum muraigaLai kETTanadu 
kuraigaLait-tIrAyO iraivanE iraivanE
